name: Into The Abyss (itch) (Alex Moffet)
description:
The game is really simple right now, just putting out the very first version of it. All it is is combat, a shot dialog, and probably buggy. However, this is the general idea of how gameplay will work.

Select a direction to attack and block in while trying to figure out the enemy (using items is neutral and magic will leave you vulnerable). Right now that's just guessing. I need to get sprites for the telegraph made and properly programmed, so good luck if you choose to fight.
